snippet.title: Liberator TD - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Liberator TD - is a glorious mix of tower defense and top down shooter genres set in a sci-fi world.  Add to your Steam Wishlist: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/681740/Liberator_TD/

Tasked with the mission to establish a new colony on a distant planet, you find yourself in a grave danger of the local insectoid wildlife. 
Gear up at the armory, build and improve the turrets, explore the planet and reveal its mysteries.

Links:
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/681740/Liberator_TD/
Website -  http://okaystudios.com/
Press-kit - http://okaystudios.com/press/

Follow us:
Steam - https://steamcommunity.com/app/681740
Twitter - https://twitter.com/OkayStudiosInfo
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/OkayStudiosInfo/
VK - https://vk.com/liberatortd

For questions and suggestions:
liberatortd@okaystudios.com
